metadata.title: ToBeInStyle Women's Classic Sheer Waist Pantyhose
features: Recommended care instructions: Machine wash in cold water. Do not bleach. Tumble Dry low.

Our Lycra Sheer Waist Pantyhose are the perfect match for any outfit. These durable, comfortable pantyhose will elevate any look to give you an aura of class and elegance. Our sheer is balanced, giving you the allure of skin, but the classiness of expensive hosiery. This product is as versatile as you are; wear it to the office, on dates, on a fun night out, or any special occasion! If you need an elegant and flattering pair of Pantyhose for any outfit, then your search is over!
Full Length. Simple, classy colors. Pull on closure. Snug and Comfy fit.
Recommended care instructions: Machine wash in cold water. Do not bleach. Tumble Dry low.
One Size Fits Most. Waist: 24-32" Weight: 90-16lbs.
description: ToBeInStyle prides itself in providing top quality clothing to its customers. We sell simple, yet elegant tops, bottoms, coats, and more that are made to last, while delivering fashionable, affordable and comfortable apparel. Our Lycra Sheer Waist Pantyhose are the perfect match for any outfit. These durable, comfortable pantyhose will elevate any look to give you an aura of class and elegance. Our sheer is balanced, giving you the allure of skin, but the classiness of expensive hosiery. This product is as versatile as you are; wear it to the office, on dates, on a fun night out, or any special occasion! If you need an elegant and flattering pair of Pantyhose for any outfit, then your search is over!
